title: Couple questions about buying Mystery Champions with Blue Essence
body:
I just have a couple question before I commit to spending BE on the Mystery Champions.

1. Are they Mystery Champions or Mystery Champion Shards?
2. I read somewhere on an official Riot post that unlocking mystery champions with Blue Essence will only unlock 4800+ BE costing champions. Is this true?

replies.body: why do we need more than 10 champs to buy mystery shards?

Those items now unlock a champion immediately when purchased, so no shards anymore. I'm not too sure about only unlocking 4800+ champs, AFAIK you can get any random unowned champion as long as you have >10 champs left to unlock.
